last_task_title: Fix HTTP 500 Proxy Connection Failures (25+ test failures)
last_task_description:
Fix All connection attempts failed errors causing HTTP 500 responses in proxy tests.

ROOT CAUSE:
- litellm_proxy_with_memory.py cannot connect to backend LiteLLM
- Mock httpx client not configured correctly in test fixtures
- Missing mock responses for LiteLLM API calls

AFFECTED TESTS (25+ failures):
- test_memory_proxy.py::test_http_methods_forwarding (6 tests)
- test_memory_proxy.py::TestProxyHandler (6 tests)
- test_memory_proxy.py::TestStreamingResponse::test_streaming_response_detection
- test_memory_proxy.py::TestEndToEndScenarios (2 tests)
- test_memory_proxy.py::TestEdgeCases::test_very_large_request_body
- test_litellm_proxy_refactored.py::TestProxyHandler (3 tests)
- test_litellm_proxy_refactored.py::TestIntegration::test_full_chat_completion_flow
- test_binary_vs_sdk.py::TestChatCompletionsParity (6 tests)
- test_binary_vs_sdk.py::TestModelsListParity::test_models_list_same_models

SOLUTION:
1. Create mock_litellm_completion fixture that returns valid responses
2. Mock httpx.AsyncClient.request() to return proper responses
3. Configure mock responses for:
   - /v1/chat/completions (200 OK with completion)
   - /v1/models (200 OK with models list)
   - Health checks

FILES TO FIX:
- Test fixtures for mocking httpx client
- tests/conftest.py or test file fixtures
- Mock configuration in test setup

VALIDATION:
Run: poetry run pytest tests/test_memory_proxy.py::test_http_methods_forwarding -v
Verify no HTTP 500 errors, tests get expected responses
